entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -13.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -13.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.7°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
